steps.title: Start, Stop, and Restart the Apache Web Server

verify.name: Verify Apache server is running
verify.hint: The Apache server should be running after starting it. Please check the output of `sudo apachectl status` and ensure the server is running.

verify.name: Verify Apache server is stopped
verify.hint: The Apache server should be stopped after running the stop command. Please check the output of `sudo apachectl status` and ensure the server is not running.

steps.title: Check the Apache Web Server Status
